pages.text: The $(mob)Witch$() is a monster that spawns in dark places in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It attacks players on sight by launching various $(item)Splash Potions$() at them, applying their effect on impact. These can apply $(thing)Slowness$(), $(thing)Poison$(), $(thing)Weakness$() or $(thing)Instant Damage$(). When the situation arise, it may also drink various potions. These can be $(thing)Water Breathing$(), $(thing)Fire Resistance$(), $(thing)Healing$() or $(thing)Swiftness$().
